A macOS media player application built with Swift that provides video playback with advanced marker and segment management capabilities for content analysis and annotation.

- Built using Swift and SwiftUI/AppKit

### 1.3 Core Value Proposition

  - Rating stars
  - Label text field

- Efficient memory usage

  - Unique ID

  - Edit markers after creation
